    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client​(java.lang.String remoteIp,
              java.lang.Integer remotePort,
              java.util.UUID userId,
              MessageHandler messageHandler)
        Creates a new Client and initialize all the static values.
        Parameters:
        remoteIp - Network IP of the Server to connect
        remotePort - Network Port of the Server to connect
        userId - The User ID of the current playing user
        messageHandler - An instance of the message handler, where the client task can write its messages in

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect​(ViewContext viewContext)
        Connects to a Server Socket. If the Server is not reachable, the client will sleep for one second and try again until the MAX_RECONNECTS is reached.
        Parameters:
        viewContext - An instance of a ViewContext to access the yatzi game

      • send

        public void send​(Transfer transfer)

      • stop

        public void stop()
